headline: A Devon and Coterra Merger Could Become One of the Largest Shale Oil Deals Ever
summary: The US shale oil industry is one of the primary keys to US energy independence, a foundational block of the Trump administration’s policies for rebuilding US industry and reducing inflation and costs for US citizens. That’s why there are thousands who are eagerly awaiting word on the developments between merger talks between Devon Energy (NYSE: ... A Devon and Coterra Merger Could Become One of the Largest Shale Oil Deals Ever
